What I Do

Web Design

I generate wireframes and mockups to showcase the structural hierarchy and visual appearance of websites.

Web Development

I combine the powers of HTML, CSS, and Javascript to make websites look good on all devices.

Squarespace

I customize templates using the Squarespace Developer Platform to give websites a more unique look.

About me

My desire to create and redesign websites began in 2016. At first, I took the self-taught path by watching online videos and working through tutorials. It was a great way for me to understand the basic languages and concepts used when creating or redesigning a website.

In 2017, I decided to enroll in the Web Designer AAS Program at Wake Tech. Over the course of the program, my proficiency in HTML, CSS, and Javascript vastly improved. I also learned the importance of accessibility, SEO, and the principles of web design.

In 2019, I completed the program and obtained an Associate Degree in web design. Since then, I continue to learn all I can about web design and how to make simple yet stunning websites.
